title: Salesforce Names Bret Taylor Co-CEO
sub_head: The appointment comes a day after he was named chairman of Twitterâ€™s board
body:
Business-software company Salesforce . com Inc. elevated Bret Taylor to the role of co-chief executive officer and vice chairman, as it issued third-quarter results, including a muted sales outlook.
Mr. Taylor has been president and chief operating officer since 2019 under CEO and chairman Marc Benioff. The move restores the co-CEO structure that Salesforce had until last year when Keith Block stepped down.
